original_text: He followed completely the ways of his father, worshiping the idols his father had worshiped, and bowing down to them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지가 행한 모든 길로 행하여 그의 아버지가 섬기던 우상을 섬겨 그것들에게 경배하고

sentences.original_text: He followed completely the ways of his father
worshiping the idols his father had worshiped
